poem:
Title: "Ripples in Democracy's Pond"

An ex-President tip-toes back,
Yet Pelosi stands firm, no slack.
A Capitol return, scene frowning,
Where once whispers turned to crowning.
'same mission', words echo, drown,
In democracy's pond, hope, renown.
Their war of words, velocity increasing,
Yet, America's voice, never ceasing.
